name: augmentor
description: Extensible, general purpose, React like hooks for the masses.

scripts.build: rollup --config rollup.config.js && npm run clean && npm run cjs && npm run min && npm run test && npm run size
scripts.clean: cat index.js | sed 's/(exports)/()/;s/({})/()/;s/exports.default = augmentor;//;s/exports\./augmentor./g;s/return exports;/return augmentor;/' > index.clean && mv index.clean index.js && drop-babel-typeof index.js
scripts.size: cat index.js | wc -c;cat min.js | wc -c;gzip -c9 min.js | wc -c;cat min.js | brotli | wc -c

author: Andrea Giammarchi
